channel.title: 30 second fun animation, please take a look!
channel.description:
Hi there, I have put together this short fun animation for the Red Bull animation competition and would really appreciate your views and feedback.
[url]https://canimation.redbull.co.uk/gallery#31841447[/url] Would also really appreciate your likes and comments as these count as votes!
Thanks

item.source: 30 second fun animation, please take a look!

item.title: 30 second fun animation, please take a look!
item.dc:creator: EvilGoodGuy
item.description:
I think a couple things that could really improve it is:

-If you gave your character a cane and made him walk all old and feebly. Then after he drinks the red bull he tosses the cane away and starts his little dance.
-keep his hand and arm looking weak as he lifts the can of redbull to drink it. He should only get a lot of energy after he has already drank it, but in your current animation he gets a bunch of energy before he even starts to raise the can to his mouth.

Read full topic
